attributes.action: want to give the public the choice of weather they want Gordon Brown as Prime Minister.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the country never had the chance to vote for Gordon, we would like to have the chance to see weather the country wants him or if we need a general election to select the person the country want to be in charge.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
